thread.title: Mississippi flags lowered to honor Oregon shooting victims
thread.title_full: Mississippi flags lowered to honor Oregon shooting victims - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Mississippi flags lowered to honor Oregon shooting victims
text:
JACKSON, Miss. (AP) - Mississippi government buildings are lowering flags to honor those killed or wounded in a mass shooting on an Oregon college campus.
Gov. Phil Bryant has ordered public buildings to fly Mississippi and U.S. flags at half-staff from noon Friday until sunset Monday.
Nine people were killed and seven others were wounded in the attack Thursday at Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Oregon.
